prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered dynamic pose with one arm raised toward heaven, one pointing to earth, chibi proportions with large translucent geometric sacred head with unique fractal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating fractal, sacred geometry, platonic solids patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Silver and dark grey with high contrast inspired by blue ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns fused with change-dynamic capes and Hexagram-patterned robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, incorporating Silk with line patterns, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and fractal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents combined with change book pendant with sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TOANTOM's profile: 'He who loves knowledge', Aethyr ASP, Air element, Tarot The Magician, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Gemini, embodying the essence: 'In TOANTOM's presence, even stones seem to whisper knowledge an inquisitive hush invites discovery as the scholar in you awakens with curiosity.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent geometric sacred head with unique fractal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating fractal, sacred geometry, platonic solids patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns fused with change-dynamic capes and Hexagram-patterned robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, incorporating Silk with line patterns
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents combined with change book pendant
visual_elements.secondary_color: dark grey with high contrast inspired by blue
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who loves knowledge'
profile_data.essence: In TOANTOM's presence, even stones seem to whisper knowledge an inquisitive hush invites discovery as the scholar in you awakens with curiosity.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Vault of Knowledge; marshals stoneclad soldiers.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent geometric form combining octahedral and dodecahedral structures, representing Air's intellectual clarity and the multidimensional nature of knowledge in the ASP Aethyr
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver represents Hod's intellectual realm, blue symbolizes Air's communicative nature, with shifting patterns reflecting Gemini's mercurial intelligence
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Reflects the complex knowledge systems of Enochian magic and sacred geometric principles
